system_help.upload: You can upload timetable images (PNG, JPG) or PDF files. Drag and drop them onto the upload area or click to browse.
system_help.processing: After upload, the system processes your timetable using OCR and AI. High confidence extractions (>80%) are validated directly, while lower confidence ones use AI enhancement.
system_help.results: You can view your extracted timetable in weekly or daily format. Each subject is color-coded for easy identification.
system_help.export: You can export your timetable data as CSV or JSON for use in other applications.
system_help.accuracy: The system achieves >90% accuracy. High-quality images typically get >80% confidence from OCR alone.

faq.question: What file formats are supported?
faq.answer: We support PNG, JPG, JPEG, and PDF files for timetable uploads.

faq.question: How accurate is the extraction?
faq.answer: The system achieves >90% accuracy. High-quality images typically get >80% confidence from OCR alone, while lower quality images are enhanced with AI.

faq.question: Can I edit the extracted timetable?
faq.answer: Yes, you can review and validate the extracted data before saving. The system provides a validation interface for corrections.

faq.question: What happens to my uploaded files?
faq.answer: Your files are processed and stored securely. The extracted data is saved in the database for future reference.

faq.question: How long does processing take?
faq.answer: Processing typically takes 6-8 seconds for high-confidence extractions and 15-20 seconds when AI enhancement is needed.
